Package.Description: Crosshairs for arcade and sniper mode

Package.Author: Andre_V

Package.Name: Strike
Package.InternalNotes:
Biryuza - Blue
Green - Green

old dev url:
https://tanksmod.com/sight-strike-for-world-of-tanks/
Package.Description:
Introducing a completely new sight for people with poor eyesight, Strike sight is designed specifically for casual gamers. Bright green color contrasting looks on all maps of the game. 

Features:
-Shows the distance to the target
-Recharge time
-The strength of your tank
-Shows the thickness of enemy armor
-Animation recharge

Package.Name: Gun Constraints for SPG and Artillery (Type set in garage)
Package.InternalNotes: 2019-08-08: using protankis gunconstraints from protanki modpack
Package.Description: Needed by all those who play tanks with limited horizontal guidance angles - self-propelled guns and tank destroyers. \r\nBy installing this mod indicators will be added on the sides of the sight in your combat interface, which will show you the boundaries to which you can rotate the barrel.
